text: Drei may refer to: * Drei (Glashaus album), a 2005 album by pop band Glashaus * Drei (Emika album) (stylised form: DREI), a 2015 album by electronic artist Emika * Three (2010 film), a German film called Drei in German == People with the surname == * Alisa Drei (born 1978), Finnish figure skater * José Luis Drei (born 1973), Brazilian football player * Umberto Drei (1925–1996), Italian racing cyclist
title: Drei
